module Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationAction

-- | A list of remediation actions.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPossibleRemediationAction</a> smart constructor.
data PossibleRemediationAction
PossibleRemediationAction' :: Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> [RemediationActionWithOrder] -> PossibleRemediationAction

-- | Information about whether an action is taken by default.
[$sel:isDefaultAction:PossibleRemediationAction'] :: PossibleRemediationAction -> Maybe Bool

-- | A description of the list of remediation actions.
[$sel:description:PossibleRemediationAction'] :: PossibleRemediationAction -> Maybe Text

-- | The ordered list of remediation actions.
[$sel:orderedRemediationActions:PossibleRemediationAction'] :: PossibleRemediationAction -> [RemediationActionWithOrder]

-- | Create a value of <a>PossibleRemediationAction</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:isDefaultAction:PossibleRemediationAction'</a>,
--   <a>possibleRemediationAction_isDefaultAction</a> - Information about
--   whether an action is taken by default.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:PossibleRemediationAction'</a>,
--   <a>possibleRemediationAction_description</a> - A description of the
--   list of remediation actions.
--   
--   <a>$sel:orderedRemediationActions:PossibleRemediationAction'</a>,
--   <a>possibleRemediationAction_orderedRemediationActions</a> - The
--   ordered list of remediation actions.
newPossibleRemediationAction :: PossibleRemediationAction

-- | Information about whether an action is taken by default.
possibleRemediationAction_isDefaultAction :: Lens' PossibleRemediationAction (Maybe Bool)

-- | A description of the list of remediation actions.
possibleRemediationAction_description :: Lens' PossibleRemediationAction (Maybe Text)

-- | The ordered list of remediation actions.
possibleRemediationAction_orderedRemediationActions :: Lens' PossibleRemediationAction [RemediationActionWithOrder]
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationAction.PossibleRemediationAction
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationAction.PossibleRemediationAction
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationAction.PossibleRemediationAction
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationAction.PossibleRemediationAction
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationAction.PossibleRemediationAction
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationAction.PossibleRemediationAction
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationAction.PossibleRemediationAction


module Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationActions

-- | A list of possible remediation action lists. Each individual possible
--   remediation action is a list of individual remediation actions.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPossibleRemediationActions</a> smart constructor.
data PossibleRemediationActions
PossibleRemediationActions' :: Maybe [PossibleRemediationAction] -> Maybe Text -> PossibleRemediationActions

-- | Information about the actions.
[$sel:actions:PossibleRemediationActions'] :: PossibleRemediationActions -> Maybe [PossibleRemediationAction]

-- | A description of the possible remediation actions list.
[$sel:description:PossibleRemediationActions'] :: PossibleRemediationActions -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>PossibleRemediationActions</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:actions:PossibleRemediationActions'</a>,
--   <a>possibleRemediationActions_actions</a> - Information about the
--   actions.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:PossibleRemediationActions'</a>,
--   <a>possibleRemediationActions_description</a> - A description of the
--   possible remediation actions list.
newPossibleRemediationActions :: PossibleRemediationActions

-- | Information about the actions.
possibleRemediationActions_actions :: Lens' PossibleRemediationActions (Maybe [PossibleRemediationAction])

-- | A description of the possible remediation actions list.
possibleRemediationActions_description :: Lens' PossibleRemediationActions (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationActions.PossibleRemediationActions
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationActions.PossibleRemediationActions
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationActions.PossibleRemediationActions
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationActions.PossibleRemediationActions
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationActions.PossibleRemediationActions
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationActions.PossibleRemediationActions
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FMS.Types.PossibleRemediationActions.PossibleRemediationActions


module Network.AWS.FMS.Types.ResourceTag

-- | The resource tags that Firewall Manager uses to determine if a
--   particular resource should be included or excluded from the Firewall
--   Manager policy. Tags enable you to categorize your Amazon Web Services
--   resources in different ways, for example, by purpose, owner, or
--   environment. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value.
--   Firewall Manager combines the tags with "AND" so that, if you add more
--   than one tag to a policy scope, a resource must have all the specified
--   tags to be included or excluded. For more information, see <a>Working
--   with Tag Editor</a>.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResourceTag</a> smart constructor.
data ResourceTag
ResourceTag' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> ResourceTag

-- | The resource tag value.
[$sel:value:ResourceTag'] :: ResourceTag -> Maybe Text

-- | The resource tag key.
[$sel:key:ResourceTag'] :: ResourceTag -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ResourceTag</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:ResourceTag'</a>, <a>resourceTag_value</a> - The
--   resource tag value.
--   
--   <a>$sel:key:ResourceTag'</a>, <a>resourceTag_key</a> - The resource
--   tag key.
newResourceTag :: Text -> ResourceTag

-- | The resource tag value.
resourceTag_value :: Lens' ResourceTag (Maybe Text)

-- | The resource tag key.
resourceTag_key :: Lens' ResourceTag Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FMS.Types.ResourceTag.ResourceTag
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FMS.Types.ResourceTag.ResourceTag
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FMS.Types.ResourceTag.ResourceTag
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FMS.Types.ResourceTag.ResourceTag
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.FMS.Types.ResourceTag.ResourceTag
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FMS.Types.ResourceTag.ResourceTag
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FMS.Types.ResourceTag.ResourceTag
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.FMS.Types.ResourceTag.ResourceTag


module Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRuleDescription

-- | Describes a set of permissions for a security group rule.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSecurityGroupRuleDescription</a> smart constructor.
data SecurityGroupRuleDescription
SecurityGroupRuleDescription' :: Maybe Natural -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Natural -> SecurityGroupRuleDescription

-- | The start of the port range for the TCP and UDP protocols, or an
--   ICMP/ICMPv6 type number. A value of <tt>-1</tt> indicates all
--   ICMP/ICMPv6 types.
[$sel:fromPort:SecurityGroupRuleDescription'] :: SecurityGroupRuleDescription -> Maybe Natural

-- | The IPv4 ranges for the security group rule.
[$sel:iPV4Range:SecurityGroupRuleDescription'] :: SecurityGroupRuleDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the prefix list for the security group rule.
[$sel:prefixListId:SecurityGroupRuleDescription'] :: SecurityGroupRuleDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | The IP protocol name (<tt>tcp</tt>, <tt>udp</tt>, <tt>icmp</tt>,
--   <tt>icmpv6</tt>) or number.
[$sel:protocol:SecurityGroupRuleDescription'] :: SecurityGroupRuleDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | The IPv6 ranges for the security group rule.
[$sel:iPV6Range:SecurityGroupRuleDescription'] :: SecurityGroupRuleDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | The end of the port range for the TCP and UDP protocols, or an
--   ICMP/ICMPv6 code. A value of <tt>-1</tt> indicates all ICMP/ICMPv6
--   codes.
[$sel:toPort:SecurityGroupRuleDescription'] :: SecurityGroupRuleDescription -> Maybe Natural

-- | Create a value of <a>SecurityGroupRuleDescription</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:fromPort:SecurityGroupRuleDescription'</a>,
--   <a>securityGroupRuleDescription_fromPort</a> - The start of the port
--   range for the TCP and UDP protocols, or an ICMP/ICMPv6 type number. A
--   value of <tt>-1</tt> indicates all ICMP/ICMPv6 types.
--   
--   <a>$sel:iPV4Range:SecurityGroupRuleDescription'</a>,
--   <a>securityGroupRuleDescription_iPV4Range</a> - The IPv4 ranges for
--   the security group rule.
--   
--   <a>$sel:prefixListId:SecurityGroupRuleDescription'</a>,
--   <a>securityGroupRuleDescription_prefixListId</a> - The ID of the
--   prefix list for the security group rule.
--   
--   <a>$sel:protocol:SecurityGroupRuleDescription'</a>,
--   <a>securityGroupRuleDescription_protocol</a> - The IP protocol name
--   (<tt>tcp</tt>, <tt>udp</tt>, <tt>icmp</tt>, <tt>icmpv6</tt>) or
--   number.
--   
--   <a>$sel:iPV6Range:SecurityGroupRuleDescription'</a>,
--   <a>securityGroupRuleDescription_iPV6Range</a> - The IPv6 ranges for
--   the security group rule.
--   
--   <a>$sel:toPort:SecurityGroupRuleDescription'</a>,
--   <a>securityGroupRuleDescription_toPort</a> - The end of the port range
--   for the TCP and UDP protocols, or an ICMP/ICMPv6 code. A value of
--   <tt>-1</tt> indicates all ICMP/ICMPv6 codes.
newSecurityGroupRuleDescription :: SecurityGroupRuleDescription

-- | The start of the port range for the TCP and UDP protocols, or an
--   ICMP/ICMPv6 type number. A value of <tt>-1</tt> indicates all
--   ICMP/ICMPv6 types.
securityGroupRuleDescription_fromPort :: Lens' SecurityGroupRuleDescription (Maybe Natural)

-- | The IPv4 ranges for the security group rule.
securityGroupRuleDescription_iPV4Range :: Lens' SecurityGroupRuleDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the prefix list for the security group rule.
securityGroupRuleDescription_prefixListId :: Lens' SecurityGroupRuleDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | The IP protocol name (<tt>tcp</tt>, <tt>udp</tt>, <tt>icmp</tt>,
--   <tt>icmpv6</tt>) or number.
securityGroupRuleDescription_protocol :: Lens' SecurityGroupRuleDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | The IPv6 ranges for the security group rule.
securityGroupRuleDescription_iPV6Range :: Lens' SecurityGroupRuleDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | The end of the port range for the TCP and UDP protocols, or an
--   ICMP/ICMPv6 code. A value of <tt>-1</tt> indicates all ICMP/ICMPv6
--   codes.
securityGroupRuleDescription_toPort :: Lens' SecurityGroupRuleDescription (Maybe Natural)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRuleDescription.SecurityGroupRuleDescription
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRuleDescription.SecurityGroupRuleDescription
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRuleDescription.SecurityGroupRuleDescription
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRuleDescription.SecurityGroupRuleDescription
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRuleDescription.SecurityGroupRuleDescription
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRuleDescription.SecurityGroupRuleDescription
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRuleDescription.SecurityGroupRuleDescription


module Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRemediationAction

-- | Remediation option for the rule specified in the
--   <tt>ViolationTarget</tt>.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSecurityGroupRemediationAction</a> smart
--   constructor.
data SecurityGroupRemediationAction
SecurityGroupRemediationAction' :: Maybe RemediationActionType -> Maybe SecurityGroupRuleDescription -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> SecurityGroupRemediationAction

-- | The remediation action that will be performed.
[$sel:remediationActionType:SecurityGroupRemediationAction'] :: SecurityGroupRemediationAction -> Maybe RemediationActionType

-- | The final state of the rule specified in the <tt>ViolationTarget</tt>
--   after it is remediated.
[$sel:remediationResult:SecurityGroupRemediationAction'] :: SecurityGroupRemediationAction -> Maybe SecurityGroupRuleDescription

-- | Indicates if the current action is the default action.
[$sel:isDefaultAction:SecurityGroupRemediationAction'] :: SecurityGroupRemediationAction -> Maybe Bool

-- | Brief description of the action that will be performed.
[$sel:description:SecurityGroupRemediationAction'] :: SecurityGroupRemediationAction -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>SecurityGroupRemediationAction</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:remediationActionType:SecurityGroupRemediationAction'</a>,
--   <a>securityGroupRemediationAction_remediationActionType</a> - The
--   remediation action that will be performed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:remediationResult:SecurityGroupRemediationAction'</a>,
--   <a>securityGroupRemediationAction_remediationResult</a> - The final
--   state of the rule specified in the <tt>ViolationTarget</tt> after it
--   is remediated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:isDefaultAction:SecurityGroupRemediationAction'</a>,
--   <a>securityGroupRemediationAction_isDefaultAction</a> - Indicates if
--   the current action is the default action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:SecurityGroupRemediationAction'</a>,
--   <a>securityGroupRemediationAction_description</a> - Brief description
--   of the action that will be performed.
newSecurityGroupRemediationAction :: SecurityGroupRemediationAction

-- | The remediation action that will be performed.
securityGroupRemediationAction_remediationActionType :: Lens' SecurityGroupRemediationAction (Maybe RemediationActionType)

-- | The final state of the rule specified in the <tt>ViolationTarget</tt>
--   after it is remediated.
securityGroupRemediationAction_remediationResult :: Lens' SecurityGroupRemediationAction (Maybe SecurityGroupRuleDescription)

-- | Indicates if the current action is the default action.
securityGroupRemediationAction_isDefaultAction :: Lens' SecurityGroupRemediationAction (Maybe Bool)

-- | Brief description of the action that will be performed.
securityGroupRemediationAction_description :: Lens' SecurityGroupRemediationAction (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRemediationAction.SecurityGroupRemediationAction
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRemediationAction.SecurityGroupRemediationAction
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRemediationAction.SecurityGroupRemediationAction
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRemediationAction.SecurityGroupRemediationAction
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRemediationAction.SecurityGroupRemediationAction
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRemediationAction.SecurityGroupRemediationAction
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityGroupRemediationAction.SecurityGroupRemediationAction


module Network.AWS.FMS.Types.AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation

-- | Violation detail for the rule violation in a security group when
--   compared to the primary security group of the Firewall Manager policy.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation</a> smart constructor.
data AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation
AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation' :: Maybe [SecurityGroupRemediationAction] -> Maybe [PartialMatch] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation

-- | Remediation options for the rule specified in the
--   <tt>ViolationTarget</tt>.
[$sel:possibleSecurityGroupRemediationActions:AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation'] :: AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation -> Maybe [SecurityGroupRemediationAction]

-- | List of rules specified in the security group of the Firewall Manager
--   policy that partially match the <tt>ViolationTarget</tt> rule.
[$sel:partialMatches:AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation'] :: AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation -> Maybe [PartialMatch]

-- | The security group rule that is being evaluated.
[$sel:violationTarget:AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation'] :: AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation -> Maybe Text

-- | A description of the security group that violates the policy.
[$sel:violationTargetDescription:AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation'] :: AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:possibleSecurityGroupRemediationActions:AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation'</a>,
--   <a>awsVPCSecurityGroupViolation_possibleSecurityGroupRemediationActions</a>
--   - Remediation options for the rule specified in the
--   <tt>ViolationTarget</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:partialMatches:AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation'</a>,
--   <a>awsVPCSecurityGroupViolation_partialMatches</a> - List of rules
--   specified in the security group of the Firewall Manager policy that
--   partially match the <tt>ViolationTarget</tt> rule.
--   
--   <a>$sel:violationTarget:AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation'</a>,
--   <a>awsVPCSecurityGroupViolation_violationTarget</a> - The security
--   group rule that is being evaluated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:violationTargetDescription:AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation'</a>,
--   <a>awsVPCSecurityGroupViolation_violationTargetDescription</a> - A
--   description of the security group that violates the policy.
newAwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation :: AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation

-- | Remediation options for the rule specified in the
--   <tt>ViolationTarget</tt>.
awsVPCSecurityGroupViolation_possibleSecurityGroupRemediationActions :: Lens' AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation (Maybe [SecurityGroupRemediationAction])

-- | List of rules specified in the security group of the Firewall Manager
--   policy that partially match the <tt>ViolationTarget</tt> rule.
awsVPCSecurityGroupViolation_partialMatches :: Lens' AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation (Maybe [PartialMatch])

-- | The security group rule that is being evaluated.
awsVPCSecurityGroupViolation_violationTarget :: Lens' AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation (Maybe Text)

-- | A description of the security group that violates the policy.
awsVPCSecurityGroupViolation_violationTargetDescription :: Lens' AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FMS.Types.AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation.AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FMS.Types.AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation.AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FMS.Types.AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation.AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FMS.Types.AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation.AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.FMS.Types.AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation.AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FMS.Types.AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation.AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FMS.Types.AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation.AwsVPCSecurityGroupViolation


module Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType
newtype SecurityServiceType
SecurityServiceType' :: Text -> SecurityServiceType
[fromSecurityServiceType] :: SecurityServiceType -> Text
pattern SecurityServiceType_DNS_FIREWALL :: SecurityServiceType
pattern SecurityServiceType_NETWORK_FIREWALL :: SecurityServiceType
pattern SecurityServiceType_SECURITY_GROUPS_COMMON :: SecurityServiceType
pattern SecurityServiceType_SECURITY_GROUPS_CONTENT_AUDIT :: SecurityServiceType
pattern SecurityServiceType_SECURITY_GROUPS_USAGE_AUDIT :: SecurityServiceType
pattern SecurityServiceType_SHIELD_ADVANCED :: SecurityServiceType
pattern SecurityServiceType_WAF :: SecurityServiceType
pattern SecurityServiceType_WAFV2 :: SecurityServiceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.ToXML Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSONKey Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSONKey Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Headers.ToHeader Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Log.ToLog Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.ByteString.ToByteString Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.ToText Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.FromText Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType

instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FMS.Types.SecurityServiceType.SecurityServiceType
